summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Columbia Ridge; Sunnydale Gardens, Division No. 1; Richmond Tracts, Division Number 2; Section 2, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; Northend Country Estates; Cedar Park No. 2; University Lake Shore Addition Division 1, 2, and 3; Woodcrest; Northend Country Estates; Allendale; as described below an placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
